about_the_game:
There must be a lamp at night, and a certain amount of dendrobium is needed every year. The sky was high in the sky, and the mist was falling, and there was a strange light coming out of it, like a cigarette burning, and it only took half a day to disperse. During the Yongle period, there were more than a hundred foreign barbarians from overseas who had retranslated it. When they saw the Benevolence Pagoda, they would bow down and praise it before leaving. This was said to be unprecedented in the four major continents.

Include content

  • After purchasing the Repayment Tower, you can get 200 reputation and 2,000 silver rewards.
  • After building the Repayment Tower, you can also get a high return of 30% of the value of the goods produced in that month every month, waiting to be claimed!

The great antiques of China and the great kilns of Yongle are the repaying gratitude pagoda. The Repaying Enlightenment Pagoda was built in the early years of Yongle. It could not have been completed without the founding spirit, material resources, and decrees of the founding ancestors, and without the courage, wisdom and talent to swallow up this tower.
There are tens of billions of golden bodies of Vajra Buddha statues above and below the pagoda. It is a golden body made of dozens of glazed bricks. Its clothes are not folded and separated, its face is not happy at all, and its beard and eyebrows are not happy and the seams are jointed together. It is believed to be the work of ghosts. When it was heard that it was fired, it had the appearance of three towers. One of them was built, the other two were buried, and they were numbered to identify them. Today, if a brick is damaged on the tower, report it to the Ministry of Industry with the name of the building, and a brick will be sent to replace it.
